purpose: To teach developers how to effectively use GitHub Copilot for paired programming
principle: Provides structured lessons and exercises demonstrating GitHub Copilot's capabilities in a collaborative coding environment
reusability: The course material can be reused by educators to teach GitHub Copilot in various programming and development courses
limitations: Focused on developers familiar with GitHub, limited to languages and environments supported by GitHub Copilot
name: Mastering-GitHub-Copilot-for-Paired-Programming
description: A 12-Lesson course teaching everything you need to know about harnessing GitHub Copilot as an AI Paired Programming resource.
highlight: Comprehensive course on using GitHub Copilot for enhanced paired programming
